title: Caterer.com Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape hospitality and catering jobs from Caterer.com. Provide either keyword/location/category OR a Caterer.com search URL (startUrl, url, or startUrls). Actor paginates and optionally scrapes detail pages.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Caterer.com search URLs to start scraping from. Leave empty to use Keyword/Location/Category instead.

keyword.title: Keyword (if not using Start URL)
keyword.description: Job search keyword(s), e.g., 'Head Chef', 'Restaurant Manager', 'Sous Chef', 'Bartender'.

location.title: Location (if not using Start URL)
location.description: Location to search for jobs (e.g., 'London', 'Manchester', 'Birmingham'). Leave empty for all locations.

category.title: Job Category
category.description: Job category to filter by (e.g., 'head-chefs', 'sous-chefs'). Leave empty to search all categories.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens job detail pages for full description and additional information. Disable for faster results.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Leave empty or set to 0 to collect all available jobs.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit. Each page typically contains 5-20 jobs.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy configuration for requests. Leave empty to use Apify Proxy with datacenter IPs (recommended for Caterer.com).

postedWithin.title: Jobs posted within
postedWithin.description: Only keep jobs posted within this time window. Select 'any' to include all jobs regardless of posting date.
